item.description:
Ok Mother Nature doesn't want us to play outside tonight so lets bring it inside and play at a new venue.

 

Keeping with the same location as the orignal event, lets go out to La Chiquita for some authentic Mexican food, Drinks, Pool, Darts and music.

 

La Chiquita has  1000 ways to make a Tequila when you have the biggest Tequila bar around....over 200 kinds.

 

La Chiquita also has Pool Tables, Dart Boards and a DJ that comes on at 9PM, if that still doesn't float our boats on this rainy Saturday night there is all kinds of activity in and around the area.

 

If you would like to check out the restaurants site, you will be presently surprised that the owner also has a link to our Meetup group posted on his site.  Check it out: 

http://www.lachiquitas.com/

 

Hope to see you all at La Chiquitas tonight, as usual if you are lost,running late or need to reach us, please call us on the Meetup cell phone at 978-304-2811

Donna & janet
item.name: 1000 things to do with Tequilla
